title: Berserker cone not applying vayne ability on-hit.
body: Basically, the title. When turning vayne into a berserker the cone DMG effect doesn't apply vayne's silverbolt stacks. (Even though tool-tip for berserker says applys on-hits same as runaan's and runaan's will apply silverbolt)

replies.body: I don't know that this is a bug.  Her effect isn't a simple on-hit effect, but applies only to the target she autos.  {{item:3085}} essentially gives her a second auto, so we should expect them to interact differently.

> [{quoted}](name=Porglit,realm=NA,application-id=PKbQ4unq,discussion-id=aTxqZYRl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-20T06:31:01.512+0000)
>
> I don't know that this is a bug.  Her effect isn't a simple on-hit effect, but applies only to the target she autos.  {{item:3085}} essentially gives her a second auto, so we should expect them to interact differently.

That's quite literally what an on-hit effect is.
